Carol Tshabalala (amụrụ n'Ọgọst 11, 1981) bụ onye mgbasa ozi egwuregwu, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na onye na-ese okwu ugbu a na-arụ maka SuperSport International na Premier League Productions. A na-akpọkarị ya "First Lady of Sport" nke South Africa, na-agunye bọọlụ, ịkụ ọkpọ na basketball
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ kwadoro FIFA Ballon d'Or na Zurich n'afọ 2011.
Tshabalala malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye mmụta na ihe ngosi Sports Buzz na SABC mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ. Ọ ga-arụ ọrụ maka SABC dị ka onye mgbasa ozi egwuregwu site na 2000 ruo 2011

Ọ sonyeere SuperSport International n'afọ 2011, na 2016, sonyeere UK South Premier League Productions (IMG productions) dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi Extra Time na SuperSport ugbu a.
Ọrụ Tshabalala na redio malitere na ụlọọrụ redio Kaya FM 95.9 dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ egwuregwu site na 2005 ruo 2007
Ọ sonyeere Redio 2000 na 2008 dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi egwuregwu oge ụgbọala ma nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo 2013.
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, a kpọrọ aha Tshabalala dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara maka onye na-agba chaa chaa egwuregwu Hollywoodbets.
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, o kwupụtara nkwa ọlụlụ ya na Instagram, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ezochi onye ọ chọrọ ịlụ.
